newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Enron Global Power cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Enron Global Power cut.

text.p: -- Painewebber analysts Ronald Barone, Daniel Barcelo and James Moynihan cut their rating for Enron Global Power & Pipelines LLC Tuesday to neutral from attractive.
-- "Our decision to change the rating is due to the fact that the stock has hit our price target," they wrote in a report.
-- "We continue to believe that the company is well positioned to benefit from the long-term growth potential of the international power and natural gas markets."
-- Shares in the Houston company closed Monday at 30-3/4, close to a 12-month high.
